**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Kitchen Equipment Repairs**

###Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4681147017 Doc4688394612
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4681147017
* **Publication Date**: 25 July 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 20 August 2024, 14:00:00 local time

###Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
* **Procurement Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Limiting the Number of Bidders is not applicable**
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: 
  •	Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  •	North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
  •	...and 13 more agreements 

###Scope of Work

This Request for Standing Offer is for the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform minor repairs to various kitchen equipment at various locations of CFB Halifax, the award however will be made only if these facilities are operated by DND.

The contract period is expected to commence on 01 October 2024, with an option period of 1-year addition at the discretion of the DND.

###How to Respond

  Please submit your RFP response through the [Ariba Discovery website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20437520?extsite=MjA0Mzc1MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 
  A Confirmation of Receipt Message can be obtained from the Party at the following e-mail address (hannah.grace@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).)

Please note that this official document can serve as your reference for complete information.
